title: 客户端启动崩溃
author: x1765254741
txt_content:
崩溃报告
        UD        MineFactoryReloaded|CompatTwilightForest{1.7.10R2.8.1} [MFR Compat: TwilightForest] ([我的工厂]-MineFactoryReloaded-[1.7.10]2.8.1-174.jar) 
        GL info: ' Vendor: 'Intel' Version: '4.4.0 - Build 21.20.16.4508' Renderer: 'Intel(R) HD Graphics 630'
        CoFHCore: -[1.7.10]3.1.4-329
        AE2 Version: beta rv3-beta-18 for Forge 10.13.4.1448
        Mantle Environment: Environment healthy.
        MineFactoryReloaded: -[1.7.10]2.8.1-174
        ThermalFoundation: -[1.7.10]1.2.6-118
        ThermalExpansion: -[1.7.10]4.1.5-248
        TConstruct Environment: Environment healthy.
        ThermalDynamics: -[1.7.10]1.2.1-172
        EnderIO: Found the following problem(s) with your installation:
                  * The RF API that is being used (1.7.10R1.0.2 from <unknown>) differes from that that is reported as being loaded (1.7.10R1.0.13B1 from [更多实用设备]extrautilities-1.2.9.jar).
                    It is a supported version, but that difference may lead to problems.
                  * Our API got loaded from [末影接口]EnderIO-1.7.10-2.3.0.429_beta.jar. That's unexpected.
                  * Our API got loaded from [末影接口]EnderIO-1.7.10-2.3.0.429_beta.jar. That's unexpected.
                  * Our API got loaded from [末影接口]EnderIO-1.7.10-2.3.0.429_beta.jar. That's unexpected.
                  * Our API got loaded from [末影接口]EnderIO-1.7.10-2.3.0.429_beta.jar. That's unexpected.
                 This may have caused the error. Try reproducing the crash WITHOUT this/these mod(s) before reporting it.
        AE2 Integration: IC2:ON, RotaryCraft:OFF, RC:OFF, BuildCraftCore:ON, BuildCraftTransport:ON, BuildCraftBuilder:ON, RF:ON, RFItem:ON, MFR:ON, DSU:ON, FZ:OFF, FMP:OFF, RB:OFF, CLApi:OFF, Waila:ON, InvTweaks:ON, NEI:ON, CraftGuide:OFF, Mekanism:OFF, ImmibisMicroblocks:OFF, BetterStorage:OFF, OpenComputers:OFF, PneumaticCraft:OFF
        Armourer's Workshop: 
                Render Type: MODEL_ATTACHMENT
                Texture Render: false
                Baking Queue: 0
                Request Queue: 0
                Texture Painting: true
                Multipass Skin Rendering: true
        求大佬解决  还有一个问题  光影核心安装了客户端无法运行  1.7.10版本

replies.txt_content:
x1765254741 发表于 2018-9-15 17:38
大佬  这个崩溃报告 麻烦看下
        Resource location: minecraft:textures/gui/title/background/panorama_0.png
        Texture object class: net.minecraft.client.renderer.texture.SimpleTexture
核心的贴图问题
把核心删除重新下载 安装forge

replies.author: a1294790523
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 a1294790523 于 2018-9-17 20:13 编辑 
x1765254741 发表于 2018-9-15 17:38
大佬  这个崩溃报告 麻烦看下
Description: Registering texture

java.lang.SecurityException: SHA-256 digest error for assets/minecraft/textures/gui/title/background/panorama_0.png复制代码
签名校验不通过，你是否更改了核心文件的贴图
建议重新下载核心文件或删除核心文件内的META-INF文件夹
如果需要修改背景等贴图，建议使用资源包的形式更改
